publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6652.1 Dave Thompson: Construction Courses in Collegesâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-6652) in the name of Marilyn Livingstone, leave out from "and that" to end and insert ", and commends ConstructionSkills, the Scottish Funding Council and Skills Development Scotland, which have all engaged constructively with Dave Thompson MSP to try to find a solution to this problem that would allow the course to be maintained in Alness".
S3M-6652.1 Construction Courses in Colleges (lodged on 28 June 2010) Rob Gibson*, Aileen Campbell*
S3M-6652.1 Construction Courses in Colleges (lodged on 28 June 2010) Bill Kidd*
